summary: A man befriends and protects a British girl from a group of nationalists that want England to hand India back to them. They fall for each other, but the man is due to marry.
cast: Vivek Oberoi|Isha Sharvani|Antonia Bernath|Sushmita Sen|Hrishitaa Bhatt|Polly Adams|Michael Maloney|Caroline Langrishe|Amrish Puri|Om Puri|Vivek Mushran|Yashpal Sharma|Shivaaji Satam|Vikram Gokhale|Zarina Wahab|Rajat Kapoor|Sudhir Mittu|Jeetu Verma|Harry Josh|Bobby Bedii|Rahul Singh|Mehul Thakur|Asha Sharma|Mithilesh Chaturvedi|Vivek Shauq|Nawab Khan|Karan Desai|Manjiri Bhate|Anna|Yash Pawar|Manav Tiwari|Sunita Shirole|P.D. Verma|Ronit Roy|Ashwini Kalsekar|Chetana Das|Vivek Srivastav
keywords: reference to krishna the hindu deity|british|india|love|karma
title: Kisna: The Warrior Poet
